title: Hoshizora Kiseki
synopsis: Kozue is a girl who loves astronomy, particularly the stars. One night, on an excursion to witness a meteorite, she meets Ginga, a boy who is able to help scientists discover more information about the stars through a mysterious ability of his. However, he is forced to stay in a protective suit in order to carry out his mission. Because of this, Kozue decides to convince Ginga to make his own decisions & to take off the suit using his own will.
staff: [['Watanabe, Akio', ['Director', ' Storyboard', ' Animation Director', ' Screenplay', ' Color Design', ' Character Design']], ['Matsubara, Toshikazu', ['Director', ' Storyboard', ' Screenplay', ' Original Creator', ' Character Design', ' Animation Director', ' Color Design']], ['Abe, Jun', ['Music']], ['Muto, Seiji', ['Music']]]
